1023638950827548672.text:
Every fast growing effective team needs two opposing archetypes: 

 the dreamer who can evangelize and attract talent and capital

 the rational executor who makes sure the big promise is realized

You should know who these people are. If one is missing—find them stat!

1022527129441976321.text:
Write this one down:

No one is going to use your dApp because it is decentralized.

They just want the best user experience.

1109166534092603392.text:
Last week we soft launched SportX (http://Sportx.bet ). 

SportX is a non-custodial betting exchange built on Ethereum & the 1st dapp on our protocol.

1st week stats:
 $113,000 DAI of bet volume
 Over 1,000 bets made
 Protocol earned 2,260 DAI of fees

Why use SportX?

1123203184078536704.text:
Yup. 

The key questions are:

1) How do you beat out centralized competitors for users

2) How many users until you sprint to decentralizationhttps://twitter.com/jrosstreacher/status/1123157333977247744 …

1109167547218345984.text:
The lower network volume is, the more tokens users earn, creating an incentive to be an early adopter of BetX-based dapps.

BetX tokens control the protocol fund, and decide how best to disburse funds to validators, developers, token holders, etc. 

Stay tuned for more info here.

1109167363482632193.text:
Each time you bet on a BetX-based dapp like SportX, you pay a small fee to the BetX protocol fund. 

These fees are pooled into one smart contract here: https://etherscan.io/token/0x89d24a6b4ccb1b6faa2625fe562bdd9a23260359?a=0xfacf5ffe5a98ac364fec689593b69bbfdf61f5ce …

In return, you earn BetX tokens. The amount of tokens you earn is based on total network volume.

1109167152328818689.text:
On a non-custodial / decentralized exchange, users self-custody assets.

Three benefits:
 Winners welcome - no ability to ban winning bettors
 Privacy preserving - log-in with wallet, no personal data needed
 Counter-party risk - control your capital yourself

Why crypto?

1109167074046365696.text:
On betting exchange, bets are peer-to-peer. 

Three benefits:
 Prices - competition between users leads to tighter spreads
 Unrestrained - liquidity set by the market, not by dealer
 Transparent - public transactions minimize information asymmetries

Why non-custodial?

1109166878470094848.text:
Three reasons why SportX is the best place for bettors:

 Exchange style = Better odds & transparency for bettors
 Non-custodial = Can’t ban you or steal your capital
 Incentives = Each time you bet, you earn protocol tokens

Each explained further below:
